name: radical-portfolio-copilot
description: Radical Portfolio Copilot - AI-Native Portfolio Insights

scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:client && npm run typecheck:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:client && npm run lint:backend
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && npm run lint || true
scripts.test: npm run test:client && npm run test:backend && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage:client && npm run test:coverage:backend
scripts.audit: npm run audit:client && npm run audit:backend
scripts.ci: npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run format:check && npm run test:coverage && npm run build:client && npm run build:backend && npm run audit
scripts.ci:test: npm run test:client && npm run test:backend
scripts.install:all: cd client && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
